223748.「この大会は モンスター酒場組合所属の\n 善良なスライムくんたちと みなさんが:
This tournament is a game of hide-and-seek between the good Slime monsters of the Monster Tavern Guild and you! The good Slime monsters
will be using various techniques to hide throughout the venue, and when you find a hidden Slime monster... approach it and emote
"I found it! You will get a reward according to the type of Slime monster you find! Then you will get points according to the type of
Slime you find! You can also cooperate with companions to find the slime. The total points earned by all participants will be your
points. Let's cooperate and earn points!

223750.「高得点を狙うときに おトクな\n チャンスゲージと チャンスターゲットについて:
Let me explain about the Chance Gauge and Chance Targets, which are very useful when aiming for a high score. First of all, the
Chance Gauge increases as you find Slime monsters. Find more and more Slime monsters and accumulate the Chance Gauge! When the
Chance Gauge accumulates, a specific type of Slime monster becomes a Chance Target. Please check the gauge to the right of the gauge. If
you find the same type of Slime monster as the Chance Target, your score will be doubled. Aim and find more and more! Please note that the
chance target has a time limit, and when the time is up, your chance will be over. You can extend the time limit by finding other types
of Slime monsters. And what's more... if you find all the Slime monsters in the Chance Targets within the time limit, the next Chance
Target will be a higher scoring one! If you clear more and more Chance Targets and get Slime monsters with high scores and high
multipliers, you can aim for great points!

223752.「この大会には いろんな種類の\n スライムくんたちが 参加していま～す。\n:
There are many different kinds of Slime monsters participating in this tournament. For example...the ordinary blue Slime monster and
the red Beth. Their scores are low, but you can find them hiding in various places around the venue! Next is Slime Stack. Everyone said,
"I found it! Then, Slime Stacks will pile up and everyone will get points! Metal Slime is the next one! He will appear in the latter
half of the Fever Time, so let's find him and score lots of points. There is also Angel Slime. He increases your Chance Gauge a lot.
Lemon Slime will help you clear difficult chance targets, and although the targets cleared by Lemon Slime do not count toward
your score, they will help you reach the next high-scoring target faster, so make good use of them! There may be a secret Slime monster
still hiding in the hall. They are very rare, so if you find one, go to Drang!

223754.「みんなで見つけられる スライムタワーくんや\n ヒミツのスライムくんたちは 誰:
When someone finds Slime Stacks or secret Slime monsters, the map will show where they were found! When someone finds Slime Stacks,
please open the map and check them out! Make good use of it and aim for a high score!

223756.「景品は ポイントを貯めると もらえます。\n 大会に参加するごとに スコアをポ:
You can get prizes by accumulating points. Each time you participate in a tournament, your score will be added to your points, so
participate and collect more points! The party scores you get are recorded and can be viewed as the ranking of your friends and team. Aim
for number one!

223758.「参加したみんなでゲットした 得点の合計が\n 一定のハイスコアを 達成したら\:
If your total accumulated score reaches a certain amount, you'll win a priiiize!
There are 3 levels of prizes. The next one will be available at <%dM_LUA_NUM_1> points, so please try your best to get it!
If you want to know what you'll get, please speak with me during the event period.

223760.「参加したみんなでゲットした 得点の合計が\n 一定のハイスコアを 達成したら\:
If your total accumulated score reaches a certain amount, you'll win a priiiize!
There are 3 levels of prizes. ...but you've already got them all! I wouldn't have expected anything less from you!

225575.「なお 本大会は 期間限定となっています。\n 詳細については こちらを ご覧く:
This event is only available for a limited
time. Please check with me for more details.
We hope you'll join in on the fun!
<end>

225581.「なお 本大会は 期間限定となっています。\n 詳細については こちらを ご覧く:
This event is only available for a limited
time. Please check with me for more details.
Hope to see you again!
<end>
